Package spaces.green_spaces

Class PayDay

java.lang.Object
spaces.ColoredSpace
spaces.GreenSpace
spaces.green_spaces.PayDay
public class PayDay
extends GreenSpace
Class implementing a pay day space.

Players on a pay day space receive their current salary from the bank.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    PayDay​(int index, int nextIndex)
    Creates a pay day space object

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void execute​(Player currPlayer, Bank b)
    Executes the action associated with this space; that is, the player receives their current salary the bank
    java.lang.String getInfo​(Player currPlayer)
    Returns the string to be used as a prompt in the actual gameplay when the player is on a pay day space

  • Constructor Details

    • PayDay

      public PayDay​(int index, int nextIndex)
      Creates a pay day space object

      In particular, a pay day space has its attributes initialized as follows:

      • Its name is assigned as "Pay Day".
      • Its index on the board is assigned the passed parameter index.
      • Its next index is assigned the passed parameter nextIndex.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the space on the board
      nextIndex - the index of the next space the player can move to from this space

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute​(Player currPlayer, Bank b)
      Executes the action associated with this space; that is, the player receives their current salary the bank

      On a pay day space, the player receives cash equivalent to their current salary from the bank.

      Specified by:
      execute in class GreenSpace
      Parameters:
      currPlayer - current player with turn
      b - Bank object of the game

    • getInfo

      public java.lang.String getInfo​(Player currPlayer)
      Returns the string to be used as a prompt in the actual gameplay when the player is on a pay day space

      In particular, the returned string reads as follows: "[Player name], you are on a Pay Day space. Receive your current salary from the bank."

      Specified by:
      getInfo in class GreenSpace
      Parameters:
      currPlayer - current player with turn
      Returns:
      string to be used as a prompt in the actual gameplay when the player is on a pay day space
